Yahoo Finance's Anjalee Khemlani says that the drugs have been \"really spectacular at providing record weight loss.\" Khemlani added, \"Ozempic really taking the lead there with $3.1 billion alone for the last quarter. Meanwhile, Wegovy over $1 billion, and Mounjaro just getting to that $1 billion mark, making them already blockbuster drugs.\" 6. What's next? (00:02:56) So what does this all mean?
